wikipedia_page.main: Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt VC (18 December 1897 – 31 July 1917) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross. He was awarded during an action at Pilckem Ridge at the Battle of Passchendaele.

link_mentions.page: List of English Victoria Cross recipients
response: |Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt || British Army  || 1917 || First World War || Ypres
There is a memorial in the church to Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt VC (1897–1917), recipient of the Victoria Cross in World War I.
* 2nd Lieutenant Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt, 14th (Service) Battalion, Hampshire Regiment, Great War
***Second Lieutenant Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt VC, (1897–1917)
*George Wyldbore Hewitt (16 Nov 1858 – 23 Apr 1924), who married Elizabeth Mary Rampini (1871–1959); one of their two sons was Second Lieutenant Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt, V.C..
* Dennis George Wyldbore Hewitt (1897–1917), First World War Victoria Cross recipient
